entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
